## isBoolean() function

Checks if value is classified as a boolean primitive or object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isBoolean: (value?: any) => value is boolean
```

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The value to check.  Returns true if value is correctly classified, else false.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

value is boolean
